title: (x) UBSA techno sans logo - Newtron ICG Open {Antonio Cavedoni}
content:
Does anyone know what font is this, if it is a font  
Any suggestions , some similar font? I have to redraw it and don´t have the logo in vector

Thanks in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181844im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo-ubsa_3639.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Looking for s.t. similar to Emery Frost logo - Blender, Gridnik {Randall Laurence Smith, Michael A}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181844/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36593 "Go to previous forum topic") [Misericordia connected script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181844/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36578 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mariano

comments.content: Don’t think this is a font. Shouldn’t be too hard to redraw.

It’s not at all like [Novarese’s Stop](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181844/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=stop+novarese) (see below). I would take Jan’s advice and redraw it, looks not too hard.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181844im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ubsa_4297.png)

Ah, got it: the font you’re looking for is [Newtron ICG Open](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181844/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/newtron/open/) (thanks, [What The Font!?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202181844/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/)).
